text: Cng klaw theid(muhammad) wa sing dı hıy ying kwa nı kar pen phyan cng klaw theid wa xallxh nan khux phu pen phyan rahwang chan kab phwk than læa xal-kru xan ni kdi thuk prathan lng ma kæ chan pheux thi chan ca di chı xal kru xan ni takteuxn phwk than læa phu thi xal kru xan ni pi thung phwk than ca yunyan doy nænxn kranan hrux wa mi brrda thi khearph sakkara xun rwm kab xallxh? Cng klaw theid(muhammad) wa chan ca mi yunyan cng klaw theid thæcring phraxngkh nan khux phu thi khwr kæ kar khearph sakkara tæ pheiyng xngkh deiyw theanan læa thæcring chan khx pliktaw xk cak sing thi phwk than hı mi phakhi(kæ xallxh)
